articles.title: Proximus NV Launches Innovation Program for Enterprise Services
articles.summary: Proximus NV has announced a new innovation program focused on leveraging emerging technologies to drive growth in the enterprise services sector. The program will focus on AI, automation, and customer engagement.

articles.title: Proximus NV Reports Strong Financial Performance
articles.summary: Proximus NV has reported solid financial results for the quarter, with revenue growth driven by strong performance in core business areas. The company reaffirmed its commitment to investing in technology and innovation.

articles.title: Proximus NV Expands Operations in United States
articles.summary: Proximus NV is expanding its operational footprint in United States with new facilities and increased investment. The expansion supports the company's growth strategy and commitment to the region.
